Dear Nursery_C Admissions Team,

Thank you for your note. As requested, here are the details at a high level:

3) Constraints/transition flexibility: I’m flexible on gradual transition/settling-in arrangements and can adapt pick-up/drop-off times within normal operating hours. I can provide any documentation promptly and confirm enrollment the same day if offered.

Please keep my candidacy under active consideration. If there is any specific availability pattern you are trying to fill (e.g., particular days/hours), I can respond quickly and adjust.

Parent_E

If you decide to submit another formal application in a future round, we will review it promptly based on availability and priorities at that time.
